analysis.description:
PreSaleBCO.fallback (/unique_chucks/9/0xcb22b112bfb0b01ba37a5a74c2be29120e510ed6.sol#511-524) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.transfer(msg.sender,tokensToSend) (/unique_chucks/9/0xcb22b112bfb0b01ba37a5a74c2be29120e510ed6.sol#523-524)

PreSaleBCO.WithdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0xcb22b112bfb0b01ba37a5a74c2be29120e510ed6.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.transfer(beneficiary,amount) (/unique_chucks/9/0xcb22b112bfb0b01ba37a5a74c2be29120e510ed6.sol)
SafeMath.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/9/0xcb22b112bfb0b01ba37a5a74c2be29120e510ed6.sol#68-76) shadows built-in symbol "assert"
